Interface IServerSystem


  • public interface IServerSystem
    This methods are called if client and server are communicated.

                   javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage mimeMessage,

        mimeMessage - smtp message that will be sent
        email - email that will be sent

      • getEmailRfc822

        Returns:

      • updateSingleMode

        Map<Object,Object> updateSingleMode(Connection con,
                                  List<SingleMode> data,
                                  Map<String,Object> hm)
        This rule is called after the content of the mail-inbox has been generated by the businesslogic and before it is returned to the client. Here you manipulate this list.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        data - Vector that contain list of emails that will be sent to client.
        parameterMap - : Map containing the parameters used to generate the singlemodelist. Following are set:
        operatorId (Integer): id of the operator requesting for the singlemodelist
        questionState (String): selected state of question (from ui)
        senderFilter (String): restriction on sender-adress (from ui)
        owner (Boolean):
        emaildate (Long): (restriction by age of email (from ui)
        limit (Integer): (maximum number of elements in singlemodelist (from ui)
        subprojectIdList (List): ids of currently selected subprojects (from ui)
        ownersubprojectIdList (List): ids of subprojects which are part of projects owned by the operator (from administration)
        listOfResponsibilities (List): ids of suprojects the operator has respponsibility in (from administration)
        languageIdsList (List): ids of languages the operator has skills for (from administration)
        documentType (Integer): the selected questiontype (fromui)
        allowedDoctypenIdList (List): ids of questiontype the operator has skills for (from administration)
        viewfilter (Boolean): is the viewfilter aktiv? (from ui)
        selectedMode(Integer):
        Returns:
        not in use, irrelevant.
        was:
        updateSingleModus

      • preExecuteInquiry

        Map preExecuteInquiry(Connection con,
                    String function,
                    int id,
                    Object data,
                    Object userObject,
                    Object request,
                    Map map)
        Is called if the server will receive a command.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        function - function that has been sent to server
        id - that currently is 0
        data - data that has been sent with function
        userObject - user object that has been sent
        request - http request
        Returns:
        not currently used

        Is called if the server will be sent data to client.
        Parameters:

        result - currently 0
        request - http request
        map - currently not used
        Returns:

      • checkFunction

        int checkFunction(Object data,
                String function,
                String sessionId,
                Object request,
                boolean release)
        Is called if the server data will be checked.
        Parameters:
        data - data for check
        function - function that has been sent to server
        sessionId - -session id
        request - http request als Object übergeben, da der Rule-Compiler sonst Probleme macht.
        release - currently not used
        Returns:
        1, if servlet call will be synchronized otherwise 0 = not synchronized
